website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a good value in Bose headphones, the company's OE (On-Ear) models makes a strong case--even if they're not cheap.
pros: The Bose OE headphones have a compact design, extra-comfortable cushy foam earpieces, full sound, and they fold up for compact storage in their included carrying case
Additionally, Bose offers a 30-day home trial
cons: While they're cheaper than Bose's noise-canceling models, they're still fairly pricey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best headphones I have ever owned. I did not realize how good the sound could be while watching movies or videos on my computer. They really enhance the sound like no other headphones. They are comfortable and block out other noises pretty well while playing music, otherwise you can hear sounds IE; the phone, t.v. etc. when the headphones are on your ears but not in use. I am extremely happy with this purchase. I bought them for about $127, I noticed they went up to $150 already. I feel like I got a good deal as well.
customer_reviews.author: Miller10

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: I owned pair of Bose headphones that wore out after a few years. I cant imagine paying over $200 for headphones but apparently a lot of people do. The Bose name is overhyped,but I certainly enjoyed my previous pair. I am glad I found several Bose headsets under $100. I had several to choose from and I don't know there is a whole lot of difference between them,but I chose this set from Amazon Warehouse. The description said good condition. To me they look brand new. I am blown away by the incredible sound these produce. The bass is outstanding! Again,I couldn't imagine paying over $200 for headphones and for $75 I couldn't imagine any headphones sounding better. Extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: Purchase from Powerbookmedic.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the Bose Audio On Ear Headphones, they were better than good Condition. Very pleased to have received them. Thank You, Loyal Amazon Customer.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Mort, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bose quality; perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are really good, as one would expect of Bose. I bought them just for use at home, not in noisy environments, so I don't miss the lack of noise-canceling features. The over-the-ear design is very comfortable for me, but I have small ears.
customer_reviews.author: A Texas Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these headphones- cannot go back to his old ones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a special birthday present. He uses them while working/ playing on the computer. He recently told me that he "loves these headphones". He forgot to bring them into work one day, and could not go back to his old headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a set of KRK Circumaural headphones and couldn't be more satisfied at the performance of these headphones. UPDATE - After about 100 hours of break-in, they sound even better!
customer_reviews.author: Mike McCloud

customer_reviews.title: Important to know
customer_reviews.text: Excellent frequency response. Even better price point. BUT... Was offered the wrong extension cable "to compliment my purchase" (male 2 male connection) Need to pay attention to extras!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued for a more Cheaply Made Model
customer_reviews.text: Too bad they discontinued this model. Much better than the new version. I've been using mine for five years. Perfect for airplanes, anywhere. I bought an extra set when I saw they were phasing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Follette

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. it was used and damaged
customer_reviews.author: Geneva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best pair of headphones I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: It's not them it's me
customer_reviews.text: At the moment I am on the fence with these headphones. Dint get me wrong they are clear and no distortion but my sins 40.00 Sonys are louder and I'm a heavy bass man. It's not them it's me
customer_reviews.author: Vinviv80

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great for working out.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the money. Chord is great, used for working out. And, I'm a professional musician and have a demanding ear. These sound surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.author: Low Hertz

customer_reviews.title: Bose OE Audio Headphones is the vey best hands no other
customer_reviews.text: Bose OE Audio Headphones is the vey best hands down no other
customer_reviews.author: freddie bates

customer_reviews.title: Bose Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Great design. Very comfortable too. My son absolutely loves them! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tara L.

customer_reviews.title: like New and it truly is indistinguishable from new
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as used, like New and it truly is indistinguishable from new. Excellent value for money!
customer_reviews.author: haroldgjr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! I am really enjoying the comfortable fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality ! I am really enjoying the comfortable fit and great audio sound.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: In a sea of overpriced headphones.. Bose saves the day!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. IMHO, they are the best headphones you can get for the price. Don't believe the hype!
customer_reviews.author: alionkinkead

customer_reviews.title: They are very good and sound well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair for my son after he bought them for me.They are very good and sound well.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene M. Dybul

customer_reviews.title: Good, let the base drop
customer_reviews.text: I love em, they cancel noise really well, and are incredibly comfortable. Pretty heavy base, but use of the equalizer on any machine can solve this.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Graff

customer_reviews.title: Great Grad Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pre owned headsets as one of my son's college graduation gifts. They're like brand new without a scuff or a mark and the price was a steal. My only problem is now he never hears when I call him because he always has them on!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy W

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones. Great sound. Product made really well. Great case and fits in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight, travel headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones: Great Bose sound quality, lightweight, & compact — perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.author: SFP

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite
customer_reviews.text: One of the favorite things I own. I had a pair that I loved so much I completely wore them out. Because of the high price, I waited a few years to replace them, substituting one lesser thing after another. When my first pair broke after many years of hard use, I should have run right out and bought another. I'm certainly glad I finally did.
customer_reviews.author: IBUYTOOMUCH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for me since my hearing has deteriorated. Gives that sound I always liked. Great deal for the price.............
customer_reviews.author: Ron Stout

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, excellent sound. I have bought three of these. Excellent gifts
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, comfortable and collapses to fit compactly in a hard side carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound proof with no sound cancellation (which hurts my ears) so i like this one more.
customer_reviews.author: Sultan Alnaim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great, better then what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Craiger

customer_reviews.title: Bose OE headphones
customer_reviews.text: Wanted these headphones. Had another exact pair that lasted about 5 years! Received them brand new in factory packaging. Perfect! Ready to wear these out for another 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Lalich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great for taking places. The sound is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: ASimons

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head - a bit uncomfortable after a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W  Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Sound is just what I was looking for.They are made well. Love the case they come with. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Little sceptical I bought these knowing that Bose would not let me down. And they didn't. Nice clear sound as I'm used too by Bose. I do recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: dulkcur

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: My kids wanted Dr. Dre headphones, I got these and I had them let me try them sounds what you expect from Bose the comfort factor I did not expect though, very nice I have some quit comfort headphones for like 300 and these felt better they don't cup your ears the same maybe that's why.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and well-built product with comfortable ear pads for a reasonable cost if high-end noise cancelling headphones are not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: An OK product.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is OK for the price of 130 dollars. Mostly used to watch movies on laptop, heavy bass.
customer_reviews.author: swoopx

customer_reviews.title: The first pair I had were fantastic, but these lasted about a week
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I had were fantastic, but these lasted about a week. I still don't know what is wrong with them. They just stopped and as someone in the sound industry, I love Bose products. I tried troubleshooting and nothing. They still sit on my desk until I figure out what to do with them. I probably should have returned them by now.
customer_reviews.author: DJKT

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if it comes with the converter that I can use on airplane. The rest is fine. Good buy as a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, very comfortable and compact.
customer_reviews.text: Case is small and fits easily into a back pack or carry on. Sound quality is very good and the headphones are very comfortable. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have plans on buying another pair the quailty the sound this is a great product they are worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Charles Spidell

customer_reviews.title: These were supposed to cancel out noise. I put ...
customer_reviews.text: These were supposed to cancel out noise. I put them on at the gym today, with music playing and heard every word by other gym users. What the ...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mishler

product_meta.title: Bose OE Audio Headphones
product_meta.description:
High quality sound, lifelike clarity and range
Comfortable, on-ear fit
feature_bullets: High quality sound, lifelike clarity and range
Collapsible headband for easy storage and portability
Designed to bring your music to life
Includes: on-ear headphones, 16 inch (0.4 m) audio cable, 43 inch (1.1 m) audio cable, and carrying case
